skillA.skillInfo: After 1.5 seconds, Deathwing breathes a stream of flame, dealing 21 damage every 0.125 seconds. Drains 30 Energy per second.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.75 seconds, Deathwing flaps his wings, dealing 70 damage to nearby enemies. World Breaker: Lava Burst Create a lava pool that damages and Slows

skillC.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, Deathwing lunges in a direction dealing 38 damage to enemies and Slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds. Deathwing bites enemies at the end of the lunge, dealing an additional 72 damage. World Breaker: Earth Shatter Damage and Stun enemies in two lines

skillD.skillInfo: After 3 seconds, fly into the sky, becoming Immune to all effects and gaining 2.5% Health per second. Once cast, this ability cannot be interrupted. Cannot be cast for 4 seconds after taking damage, Basic Attacking or casting an Ability.

skillA.skillInfo: After 2 seconds, Deathwing flies in the targeted direction, dealing 90 damage on impact and leaving scorched ground that deals 40 damage a second. Lasts 6 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Deathwing is fitted with 4 Armor Plates which grant 10 Armor each. Every 25% Health lost causes Deathwing to lose a plate. Plates are only restored when Dragonflight is used, based on the amount of Health Deathwing has when landing.  Deathwing is also a mighty Dragon Aspect who is permanently Unstoppable and deals 100% additional Spell Damage to Heroes, but views his allies with contempt and ignores any of their friendly effects.

skillA.skillInfo: Unleash your sword in the target direction, continuously dealing 30 damage to enemies caught in its path.

skillB.skillInfo: Passive: Basic Attack and Ability damage cause enemies to bleed for 44 damage over 4 seconds. Stacks 5 times. Active: Qhira deals 32 damage and heals for 85 Health per enemy Hero affected. Damage and healing is increased by 50% per each additional stack on that Hero.

skillC.skillInfo: Attach your sword on the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 96 damage and Stunning them for 0.25 seconds. Once attached, Qhira becomes Immune to all effects, swinging around the target for 2.75 seconds and dealing 105 damage to enemies between you and the target. Re-activate to send you to the target's location knocking them away, dealing 108 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 44 damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1 second.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, deal 395 damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.

trait.skillInfo: Qhira fires a grappling hook that pulls her to terrain it contacts. If an enemy Hero is hit, they take 35 damage and Qhira launches at them, kicking them for an additional 108 damage.  Can be used while Revolving Sweep is active.

skillA.skillInfo: Cast for 0.75 seconds to heal an allied Hero for 260.

skillB.skillInfo: Send light that deals 140 damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for 130 in a wider path. Healing increases by 25% per enemy Hero hit.

skillC.skillInfo: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing 155 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for 1.25 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

skillB.skillInfo: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds. The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel.

skillA.skillInfo: Lunge towards a targeted direction and stab, dealing 35 damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Channel to Stun for 1 second and deal 70 additional damage when it fully finishes.

skillB.skillInfo: Release a fiery wave that deals 100 damage. Enemies hit by the center take 50% bonus damage and are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Shroud Imperius in flames for 3 seconds, striking a nearby enemy for 19 damage every 0.25 seconds. Imperius heals for 50% of the damage dealt, increased to 100% against Heroes.

skillA.skillInfo: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 Shield for 3 seconds. If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 damage to the first enemy hit.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

trait.skillInfo: Each Basic Ability marks enemy Heroes hit for 10 seconds. Basic Attacks consume the target's marks, dealing 20% bonus damage per mark and healing for 75 per mark.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, deal 165 damage to enemies in a line. Hitting a Hero with Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 2 seconds, refunds 40 Mana, and causes Orphea to dash a short distance upon moving.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.625 seconds, deal 285 damage to nearby enemies in front of Orphea.

skillC.skillInfo: Release a wave of dread that deals 85 damage to enemies hit. Dread erupts 0.75 seconds after reaching the end of its path, dealing 175 damage and Slowing enemies in the area by 25% for 2 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants 1 Chaos. Chaos can stack up to 3 times.  While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consume all Chaos, dealing 50% increased damage per stack, and healing for 100% of the damage dealt.

skillA.skillInfo: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 69 damage to enemies. Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 damage per second to enemies. Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

skillB.skillInfo: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Mal'Ganis heals for 45% of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and 10% of damage dealt to non-Heroes.

skillA.skillInfo: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after 0.75 seconds, dealing 127 damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the ring take 45 damage every 0.25 seconds. Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3%, up to 30%.

skillC.skillInfo: Teleport to a location, dealing 78 damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location. After 2.5 seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.

skillA.skillInfo: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 damage to them over the same duration. Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

trait.skillInfo: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns.  Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant 1.5 seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants 0.3 seconds per Hero hit.

skillA.skillInfo: Heal an allied Hero for 140 and gain Desperation for 4 seconds. Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 45, and stacks up to 3 times. Current Mana Cost: 45

skillB.skillInfo: Channel on an enemy Hero for up to 3 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds and Slowing them by 30%. Removes a stack of Desperation. Shares a cooldown with Clemency.

skillC.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, smite enemies in a straight line for 82 damage. If the first strike hits an enemy Hero, a second strike will occur after a short delay.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 329 over 3 seconds while Channeling. Removes a stack of Desperation Shares a cooldown with Inquisition.

skillA.skillInfo: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

trait.skillInfo: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds. Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.  Activate to gain 25% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds. Can be cast while channeling abilities.

skillA.skillInfo: Unleash holy energy around Yrel, dealing 42 damage to nearby enemies and healing her for 96. Charging up this Ability increases its damage up to 140, and healing up to 320.

skillB.skillInfo: Swing Yrel's hammer, dealing 38 damage to enemies in front of her and knocking them away. Charging up this Ability increases its knockback distance, and damage up to 125. Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Leap to a location, dealing 225 damage to enemies in an area and Slowing them by 50% for 1 second. Charging up this Ability increases its range.

skillA.skillInfo: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

skillB.skillInfo: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to instantly charge Yrel's next Basic Ability at no mana cost.  Passive: Yrel's Basic Abilities charge up over 1.5 seconds, increasing in effectiveness, but reducing Yrel's Movement Speed by 25%.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 270. Limit 5 active Potions.

skillB.skillInfo: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 1.75 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after. Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

trait.skillInfo: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.

skillA.skillInfo: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by 25% for 4 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Activate to change between Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon and Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb. Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon: Basic Attack speed increased by 150%. Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb: Basic Attacks have 1.25 increased range, deal 25% more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.

skillC.skillInfo: Warp to a targeted location, phasing out after 0.5 seconds, and arriving 0.75 seconds later.

skillA.skillInfo: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

trait.skillInfo: Fenix has a permanent 760 Shield which regenerates at 10% per second after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 152 damage to enemies in a crescent area. Hitting at least 2 enemy Heroes with Fan of Knives reduces its cooldown to 0.5 seconds, and refunds its Mana cost.

skillB.skillInfo: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing 110 damage and breaking the tether.

skillC.skillInfo: Send a shadow of Maiev outward that will return to its cast location, dealing 150 damage to enemies along both paths. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce the cooldown by 4 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds. Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Leap into the air, becoming Immune to all hostile effects for 0.75 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire two streams that deal 83 damage to enemies hit. Flame Stream Ignites Oil Spills it comes in contact with.

skillB.skillInfo: Vector Targeting Dispense a slick of oil that lasts for 5 seconds and Slows enemies that come in contact with it by 50%. Oil Spills are Ignited for 2.5 seconds when hit by Flame Stream. Ignited Oil Spills no longer Slow enemies, but instead deal 16 damage to them every 0.3 seconds. Additionally, Blaze is healed for 49 Health every 0.3 seconds while standing in Ignited Oil Spills. Stores up to 2 charges.

skillC.skillInfo: After 0.375 seconds, charge forward. Colliding with an enemy Hero deals 52 damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stuns them for 1.25 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 damage to enemies in a line. Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

skillB.skillInfo: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds. Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

trait.skillInfo: Gain 40 Armor and deal 40 damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds.  Each Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces Pyromania's cooldown by 5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled.

skillB.skillInfo: Fire an arrow that deals 88 to the first enemy Hero hit. Scatter Arrow can collide with terrain and Structures, splitting into 5 arrows that travel extra distance, ricochet up to 4 additional times, and deal 88 damage each to the first enemy hit.

skillC.skillInfo: Fire an arrow that grants vision in a large area for 5 seconds. Enemies inside are revealed for 1 second. If Sonic Arrow lands directly on an enemy, it deals 165 damage to them and follows them as they move.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 78 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area. Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds. After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Jump over unpathable terrain or Structures, up to a maximum range.

skillA.skillInfo: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for 150% of that amount. Dragonqueen: Breath of Life Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health. Dragonqueen: Preservation Heal area and amount greatly increased.

skillC.skillInfo: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 damage over 5.5 seconds. Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost. Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

skillA.skillInfo: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 Health. 2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

trait.skillInfo: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health.  While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, and Slows, is reduced by 50%.  Lasts 15 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 118 damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures. Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

skillB.skillInfo: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage. Limit 1 active mine.

skillC.skillInfo: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds. Limit 1 active trap.

skillA.skillInfo: Create a motorized bomb with 530 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement. RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 720 damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 445 to enemies on the edge.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving. After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 890 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

trait.skillInfo: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 damage to nearby enemies. Deals 75% less damage to Structures.  Detonate Mine  Detonate an active Concussion Mine.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 195 Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.

skillB.skillInfo: Toss a grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for 152 Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds. Cannot be used on Vehicles.

skillA.skillInfo: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster. Cannot be used on Ana.

skillB.skillInfo: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 and enemies are damaged for 135. Deals 50% less damage to Structures. Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

trait.skillInfo: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing 40 damage over 5 seconds, plus additional damage equal to the current number of stacks on the target, stacking up to 5 times. Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Shrike.  Aim Down Sights  Activating Shrike reduces your Movement Speed by 25%, but increases the Range of Healing Dart and Sleep Dart by 25% while also allowing them to pierce one Hero. Lasts until canceled.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 82 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 180 damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

skillC.skillInfo: Launch a chain, dealing 97 damage to the first enemy Hero hit. For 3 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 damage to its target and 275 damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.  Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, gain the Glacial Spike Ability.  Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.  Blight: 0/30

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 81 damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for 0.5 seconds and then Slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 156 damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

skillC.skillInfo: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second. Stores up to 3 charges.

trait.skillInfo: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

skillA.skillInfo: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 222 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds. Each cast of Healing Pathogen can only spread to each allied Hero 1 time.

skillB.skillInfo: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 88 damage upon expiring or being removed.

skillC.skillInfo: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals 136 damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.

skillA.skillInfo: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

skillB.skillInfo: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 450 Health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.  Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.

skillA.skillInfo: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 damage and healing Malthael for 25 per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

skillC.skillInfo: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

skillA.skillInfo: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

skillB.skillInfo: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 20 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.  Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health every 1 second.

skillA.skillInfo: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away. D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.

skillB.skillInfo: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn. Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

skillC.skillInfo: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 1200 to 400 damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures. Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.

skillA.skillInfo: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds. Requires Mech Mode.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit. Requires Pilot Mode.

trait.skillInfo: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 damage to the first enemy hit. Stores up to 3 charges. Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

skillB.skillInfo: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 damage. Total Damage Deflected: 0

skillC.skillInfo: Dash forward, dealing 190 damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

skillA.skillInfo: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Perform two slashes dealing 145 damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 290 damage to enemies in their area.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to jump to the target area.

skillA.skillInfo: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 damage to enemies in their path.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, deal 50 damage and Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds. Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

skillC.skillInfo: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 damage to enemies hit.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

trait.skillInfo: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 40 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 40%.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 damage to all enemies it passes through. Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds. Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 damage to nearby enemies. Stores up to 2 charges.

skillC.skillInfo: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds. Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field. Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to gain an additional 60% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early. Worker Rush is always active while at the Hall of Storms. Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

skillA.skillInfo: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

trait.skillInfo: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field.  Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 105 damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

skillB.skillInfo: Play one of two music tracks for Lcio and his allies. Healing Boost: Passively heal Lcio and nearby allied Heroes for 15 health per second. Speed Boost: Increase the Movement Speed of Lcio and nearby allied Heroes by 10%.

skillC.skillInfo: Raise Lcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 112 Health per second and Speed Boost to 30% increased Movement Speed.

skillD.skillInfo: When moving alongside terrain, Lcio begins to Wall Ride for 2 seconds. While Wall Ride is active, Lcio can walk through units and gains 20% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1 second, Lcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250.

trait.skillInfo: While moving alongside terrain, activate to slide towards a targeted location. Enemies hit take 100 damage and are Slowed by 75% for 1 second.

skillA.skillInfo: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second. Awards 1 Combo Point. Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy and reduce their Armor.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 130 damage in an area around Valeera. Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit. Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy.

skillC.skillInfo: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point. 1 Point: 85 2 Points: 170 3 Points: 255 Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

skillA.skillInfo: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

skillB.skillInfo: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

trait.skillInfo: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

skillA.skillInfo: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

skillB.skillInfo: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

skillB.skillInfo: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.  You Want Axe?  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

skillA.skillInfo: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Vector Targeting Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing 272 damage per second for 1.75 seconds. Molten Core: Meteor Shower Drop a line of meteor impacts.

skillC.skillInfo: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 damage to nearby enemies. Molten Core: Explosive Rune Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

skillA.skillInfo: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 damage. Enemies in the center take 594 damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

trait.skillInfo: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 Health that burns away over 18 seconds.  Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

skillA.skillInfo: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35, increased to 140 against Heroes.

skillB.skillInfo: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%. Stores up to 2 charges.

skillC.skillInfo: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 damage and Slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

skillA.skillInfo: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.

skillB.skillInfo: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

trait.skillInfo: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Teleport a short distance in the direction of the mouse cursor, creating 2 Mirror Images for 8 seconds with 100% of Samuro's current Health that Basic Attack enemies for 11 damage. Images have their duration increased by 1 second each time they or Samuro use a Basic Attack against an enemy Hero. Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes. Maximum 2 Mirror Images can be active at at time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.

skillB.skillInfo: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk. Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

skillC.skillInfo: Grant Samuro Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until he attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage. While Stealthed, Samuro heals for 1% of his maximum Health every second, his Movement Speed is increased by 25% and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible. Samuro is Unrevealable for the first 1 second of Wind Walk.

skillA.skillInfo: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 3 seconds, granting him 25 Armor and dealing 180 damage per second to nearby enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%. Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.  Advancing Strikes  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch a particle grenade that deals 75 damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures. Stores up to 4 charges.

skillB.skillInfo: Gain a Shield that absorbs 560 damage for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Grants an allied Hero a Shield that absorbs 420 damage for 3 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

trait.skillInfo: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 9 damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.

skillA.skillInfo: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 165 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Vector Targeting Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 damage to enemies.

skillC.skillInfo: Deal 62 damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 health for each Hero hit.

skillA.skillInfo: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

skillB.skillInfo: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

trait.skillInfo: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

skillA.skillInfo: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 40 damage to enemies and an additional 160 damage to enemies caught in the center.

skillB.skillInfo: Consume Auriel's stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

skillC.skillInfo: Deal 55 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 165 damage.

skillA.skillInfo: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 damage to all nearby enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 1 second. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 100% of their maximum Health at the location where they died. Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.

trait.skillInfo: Passive: 60% of the damage Auriel deals to Heroes and 20% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy.  Bestow an allied Hero with Hope.  While they remain near Auriel, 30% of their damage to Heroes and 10% of their damage to non-Heroes is converted to energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time.  Auriel can store up to 475 energy.

skillA.skillInfo: Release a wave of flame, dealing 200 damage to enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 Health per second.

skillC.skillInfo: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 damage in a small area.

trait.skillInfo: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.  Activate to restore 25% of Gul'dan's Mana.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch a rift that deals 170 damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana. Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increase the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

skillB.skillInfo: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds. Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 20% of the damage it absorbed.

skillC.skillInfo: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, fire a missile that deals 305 damage to the first enemy hit. Deals 50% damage to Structures. Casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind that mimics Chromie's Sand Blast and Basic Attack, dealing 40% damage. Maximum of 1 Echo active at a time.

skillB.skillInfo: Vector Targeting Launch 3 blasts into the air that land every 0.75 seconds towards the targeted direction, dealing 204 damage each.

skillC.skillInfo: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. Chromie's Trait can be activated to detonate the trap, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Maximum of 1 trap active at a time.

skillA.skillInfo: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

skillB.skillInfo: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them. Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

trait.skillInfo: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!  Detonate Time Trap  Detonates active Time Traps.

skillA.skillInfo: Dash towards an area. Stores up to 3 charges.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 220 damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

skillC.skillInfo: Tracer returns to the position she was at 3 seconds ago, refilling her ammo, and removing all negative status effects from herself.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire a short range bomb that can attach to an enemy if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 360 damage to them and 180 damage to other nearby enemies. This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

trait.skillInfo: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.75 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.

skillA.skillInfo: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 damage to the first enemy hit, Stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds. If Dehaka is Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 47 damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

skillC.skillInfo: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground. Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

trait.skillInfo: Heal Dehaka for a small amount per stored Essence over 5 seconds. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.  Passive: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Maximum of 50 Essence.

skillA.skillInfo: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 210 damage to enemies and spawning a Skeletal Warrior when hitting enemy Heroes. These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.

skillB.skillInfo: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

skillC.skillInfo: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds. All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of Xul's maximum Health for 3 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 240 Health that attacks for 21 damage and lasts up to 12 seconds. Upon death, Skeletal Warriors deal 50 damage to nearby enemies.  Up to 3 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once when spawned in this way.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

skillB.skillInfo: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to 270 more damage.

skillC.skillInfo: Teleport a short distance instantly.

skillA.skillInfo: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

skillB.skillInfo: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 damage.

trait.skillInfo: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.

skillA.skillInfo: Hurl a flask that deals 55 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 220 damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

skillB.skillInfo: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage. Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

skillA.skillInfo: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

skillB.skillInfo: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 40% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

trait.skillInfo: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.  While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged.  While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are Slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. When the Wisp is in a bush for more 2 seconds, its vision radius is increased by 75%. Lasts 45 seconds.

skillD.skillInfo: Moves the Wisp to a new location.

skillA.skillInfo: Send forth vines that deal 176 damage to all enemies in a line. Stores up to 3 charges.

skillB.skillInfo: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

trait.skillInfo: Lunara's Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 36 damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

skillB.skillInfo: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 when an enemy is Ignited.

skillC.skillInfo: Roll a bomb dealing 91 damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 210 damage in an area.

skillA.skillInfo: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds. Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 damage.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

skillA.skillInfo: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

skillB.skillInfo: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 when an enemy is Ignited.

skillC.skillInfo: Roll a bomb dealing 91 damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 210 damage in an area.

skillA.skillInfo: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 damage.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

skillA.skillInfo: Dash forward and deal 57 damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

skillC.skillInfo: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

skillB.skillInfo: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

trait.skillInfo: After taking damage while below 75% Health, Artanis gains a 375 Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Heal target allied Hero or Minion for 172 Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second. Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.

skillB.skillInfo: Grant target ally Hero 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 208 to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

skillA.skillInfo: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

trait.skillInfo: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 141 damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Misha charges in a line, dealing 150 damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Heal Misha for 714 Health over 5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Passive: Misha gains 15% move speed.   Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait.  Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar.  Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

skillA.skillInfo: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack. Stores up to 2 charges.

skillB.skillInfo: Heal nearby Heroes for 276 and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

skillA.skillInfo: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!

skillB.skillInfo: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 3 seconds. Leoric's Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while this is active.

skillC.skillInfo: Leoric separates from his body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, his body jumps to his wraith.

skillA.skillInfo: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

trait.skillInfo: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.  Wrath Of The Bone King  Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 110 damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds. The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 37 damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done. Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 damage.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 damage to enemies. Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

trait.skillInfo: Upon dying, nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.  Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.  Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.

skillA.skillInfo: Step forward dealing 113 damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

skillC.skillInfo: Deal 59 damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Johanna leaps towards an area. While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 114 damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 674 damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1 second, deal 345 damage in an area. Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 126 damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

skillC.skillInfo: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 damage and splashing for 39 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 damage to an enemy Hero and 405 damage to enemies nearby.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful.

skillA.skillInfo: Shoot the closest enemy up to 5 times over 1.5 seconds for 39 damage, prioritizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.

skillB.skillInfo: Throw a dagger at a target enemy that deals 30 damage and an additional 150 damage over 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.

skillC.skillInfo: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

skillA.skillInfo: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for 3 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds.    Banshee's Curse  Basic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 3 stacks.

skillA.skillInfo: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown. Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

skillC.skillInfo: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

skillD.skillInfo: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 228 damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for 1 second. Lasts 15 seconds. Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

trait.skillInfo: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.

skillA.skillInfo: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 162 damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 81 damage to each enemy hit.

skillB.skillInfo: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals 153 damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

skillC.skillInfo: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

trait.skillInfo: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 Health.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 184 damage and Chill the target.

skillB.skillInfo: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

skillC.skillInfo: Deal 220 damage and Chill targets.

skillA.skillInfo: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Quest: Deal 15,000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes.  Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.

skillA.skillInfo: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 184 damage on impact. Quest: Hitting a Hero or killing a Minion within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation grants 2 Annihilation. Reward: Each stack of Annihilation increases the damage of Globe of Annihilation by 1, up to 400.

skillB.skillInfo: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches forward. Warriors deal 35 damage per Attack and 18 damage to nearby enemies every second. Lasts for 10 seconds. Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

skillC.skillInfo: Channel a beam of death on an enemy, dealing 128 damage per second for 2.5 seconds. If the Channel lasts its full duration, deal an extra 340 damage to the target. Azmodan's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% while Channeling.

skillA.skillInfo: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 damage, have 750 Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 97 damage to nearby enemies. Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

skillB.skillInfo: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage. Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

trait.skillInfo: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at any allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan Demon. The Lieutenant will cast Demonic Smite every 7 seconds, instantly killing an enemy Minion. Lasts 20 seconds.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

skillA.skillInfo: Deals 90 damage. Stuns for 1 second.

skillB.skillInfo: Gain a Shield that grants 40 Spell Armor and absorbs 315 damage over 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Burrow to the target location, dealing 91 damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 68 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

trait.skillInfo: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 damage.

skillA.skillInfo: Kick through target enemy, dealing 120 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 50 damage and soak enemies in Brew for 3 seconds, Slowing them by 10%. After 1.25 seconds, the Slow is increased to 40%. After being used, this ability becomes Breath of Fire. Breath of Fire Deal damage and Ignite Brew-soaked enemies.

skillC.skillInfo: Damage taken over the next 3 seconds is prevented. Once this effect ends, Chen receives 75% of the damage taken over 5 seconds. This damage cannot be modified.

skillA.skillInfo: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability. The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits a Shield. Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

trait.skillInfo: Chen drinks from his keg, gaining 50 Brew and 180 temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 540 while drinking. Shields persist for 4 seconds after he stops drinking.

skillA.skillInfo: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 260 Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 260 Health to them.

skillB.skillInfo: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Create a totem that Slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 40% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

skillA.skillInfo: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 damage to enemies it hits. Stores up to 4 charges.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 71 damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 140 damage. The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 27 damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 94 damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds and reveal the surrounding area while active.  Stores up to 3 charges.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 86 damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%. Deal 210 damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

skillB.skillInfo: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

skillC.skillInfo: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

skillB.skillInfo: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

trait.skillInfo: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying.  If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

skillA.skillInfo: Shoot a flare dealing 75 damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.

skillB.skillInfo: Polymorph a target for 1.5 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 25% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

skillC.skillInfo: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 25 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 25%.

skillD.skillInfo: After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 20% of their maximum Health.

skillA.skillInfo: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200. Stores up to 2 charges.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 damage and pushing enemies away.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.  Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 105 every 4 seconds

skillA.skillInfo: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within 6 range for 175 Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals 26 damage and heals the ally for 20. Lasts for 8 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 133 damage. Affected targets are Blinded for 1.5 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.

skillA.skillInfo: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

skillB.skillInfo: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 552 damage to the target and 276 damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while Channeling.

skillB.skillInfo: Lob a grenade that deals 256 damage, knocking enemies away.

skillC.skillInfo: Dash a short distance.

skillA.skillInfo: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

skillB.skillInfo: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds. Stores up to 3 charges.

skillC.skillInfo: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

skillA.skillInfo: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

skillB.skillInfo: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

trait.skillInfo: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 16 seconds, have 350 health and deal 46 damage with each Basic Attack, dealing 25% bonus damage to enemy Structures.

skillA.skillInfo: Deals 164 damage to target enemy. Can be self-cast to heal for 262 Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 damage.

skillC.skillInfo: Deal 40 damage per second to nearby enemies and Slow their Movement Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Frozen Tempest's effects last for 1.5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds and atttack for 20 damage. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Deals 230 damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately and deal 99 increased damage. Dealing damage restores 30 Mana.

skillA.skillInfo: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 130 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional 36 damage. Diablo heals for 130% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

skillC.skillInfo: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%. Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

trait.skillInfo: Repeatable Quest: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.3% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

skillA.skillInfo: Dive at the target, dealing 66 damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

skillB.skillInfo: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases Illidan's Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

trait.skillInfo: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns by 1 second.
