skillA.skillInfo: Leap to a target, dealing 130 damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1.25 seconds, deal 165 damage to enemies within the target area, Stunning them for 1 second.

skillC.skillInfo: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 195 damage to nearby enemies.

skillA.skillInfo: Deals 74 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

trait.skillInfo: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.  Current maximum: 1004

skillA.skillInfo: Heal an allied Hero for 380 Health over 20 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 90 damage to enemies in an area and reveal them for 2 seconds. Allies with an active Regrowth are healed for 130 Health for each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire.

skillC.skillInfo: Root enemy Heroes in an area for 1.25 seconds, and deal 117 damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Cannot be used on Heroes that do not use Mana.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 damage to the first enemy hit and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Quest: Hit 25 Heroes with Storm Bolt. Heroes who die within 2.5 seconds of being hit by Storm Bolt count as hitting 3 additional Heroes. Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.

skillB.skillInfo: Blast nearby enemies for 96 damage and Slow them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed reduced by 25% for the duration.

skillC.skillInfo: Leap to target location, dealing 59 damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 30 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 30%.

skillA.skillInfo: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 damage and knocking them aside.

trait.skillInfo: Muradin restores 55 Health per second when he has not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 111 Health per second.

skillA.skillInfo: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 38 damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 damage and last for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 119 damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

skillA.skillInfo: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 damage when summoned, attacks for 140 damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 230 damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Nazeebo's Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 67 additional damage over 6 seconds.   Quest: If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains 6 Health and 1 Mana.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 230 damage to the first enemy hit. Passive: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 6%, stacking up to 30%. Gain an additional 25% damage bonus at maximum stacks. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 100 damage to an enemy and Slow them by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds with 100% of Nova's current Health that attacks enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's base damage. Whenever a Decoy takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to instantly grant Stealth to Nova and spawn a Holo Decoy at her location. Nova is Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds when Stealthed by Ghost Protocol.

skillA.skillInfo: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 damage each.

skillB.skillInfo: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

trait.skillInfo: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Passive: Gain 15% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 220 damage, knock back, and Slow enemies in a line by 20% for 2 seconds. Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.

skillB.skillInfo: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain 30% Attack Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.

skillC.skillInfo: Heal Raynor for 25% of his maximum Health over 1 second. Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by 0.5 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

skillA.skillInfo: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 damage per second and regenerates 75 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee. The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Every 4th Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals 125% more damage to the main target.

skillA.skillInfo: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds. Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 141 damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back. Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

skillC.skillInfo: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

skillD.skillInfo: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Hall of Storms. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

skillB.skillInfo: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

skillB.skillInfo: Deals 176 damage to the target enemy, and 44 to enemies behind the target.

skillC.skillInfo: Deals 138 damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, healing for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

skillA.skillInfo: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

trait.skillInfo: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw El'druin to the target area, dealing 110 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. It can be reactivated within 5 seconds to teleport Tyrael to El'druin and Slow nearby enemies again.

skillB.skillInfo: Shields Tyrael for 336 damage and nearby allied Heroes and Minions for 40% as much for 4 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Rake target area for 150 damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Upon dying, become Invulnerable and explode for 550 damage after 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit by this effect reduces Tyrael's death timer by 10%.

skillA.skillInfo: Heal an ally Hero for 255. Light of Elune's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds every time Tyrande damages an enemy. Stores up to 2 charges. Cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

skillB.skillInfo: Send an Owl across the battleground revealing its path, dealing 120 damage to the first Hero hit, and revealing them for 5 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: After 0.75 seconds, deal 150 damage and Stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 92 damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Reveal a non-Structure enemy and reduce their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Heal target allied Hero for 362 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 Health.

skillB.skillInfo: Heal all allied Heroes and Minions in a line for 177 Health, dealing 177 damage to enemies.

skillC.skillInfo: Deal 109 damage and Stun the target for 1 second.

skillA.skillInfo: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 170 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Allied Heroes affected by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.  Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

skillA.skillInfo: Fire an arrow that deals 140 damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing 80 damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 172 damage to enemies within the target area.

skillC.skillInfo: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

skillA.skillInfo: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

trait.skillInfo: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Deal 200 damage to nearby enemies.

skillB.skillInfo: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 240 damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage. Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

trait.skillInfo: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

skillA.skillInfo: Slide to a location dealing 91 damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

skillB.skillInfo: Deals 68 damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

skillC.skillInfo: Regenerate 66 Health per second for 4 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.

skillA.skillInfo: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing 121 damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 107 damage to an enemy, and an additional 75 damage per second for 4 seconds while close to the target.

skillC.skillInfo: Dashes forward and grants a 171 point Shield for 3 seconds.

skillD.skillInfo: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.

skillA.skillInfo: After 1 second, deal 475 damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

skillB.skillInfo: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

trait.skillInfo: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Creates a turret that deals 62 damage. Lasts for 30 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

skillB.skillInfo: Charged attack that deals 137 damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds. Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

skillC.skillInfo: Places a bomb that deals 233 damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

skillD.skillInfo: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.

skillA.skillInfo: Activate to gain 40 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

skillB.skillInfo: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 damage.

trait.skillInfo: Destroyed enemy Structures and Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3 seconds.   Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

skillA.skillInfo: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 damage.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 104 damage to enemies within the target area. Enemies in the inner impact area take 40% more damage and are Slowed by 45% for 1.5 seconds.

skillC.skillInfo: Deal 319 damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches's maximum Health.

skillD.skillInfo: Activate to use Hook that can hit allied Heroes. When used to pull allies, the cooldown of Hook is reduced by 50%.

skillA.skillInfo: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

skillB.skillInfo: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

trait.skillInfo: Basic Attacks splash Vile Gas, poisoning nearby enemies for 45 damage over 3 seconds. Re-applying Vile Gas increases its current duration to a maximum of 10 seconds.

skillA.skillInfo: Grant an allied Hero, Minion, or Structure a Shield that absorbs 455 damage over 4 seconds. If the target is a Hero, they heal for 40% of their Basic Attack damage done while Shielded.

skillB.skillInfo: Deal 82 damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 12% for each consecutive instance of damage, up to 60%.

skillC.skillInfo: Tassadar becomes Invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

skillA.skillInfo: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds. Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

skillB.skillInfo: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds. Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 35%.

trait.skillInfo: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds.  Distortion Beam  Tassadar's Basic Attack is a beam that Slows enemy units by 25%.
